Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

Title: Requires social media networks to provide and maintain mechanisms for reporting vaccine misinformation on their platform
Summary: Requires social media networks to provide and maintain mechanisms and policies for reporting vaccine misinformation on their platform.
LawCode: Add ยง394-ccc, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring social media networks to provide and maintain mechanisms for reporting vaccine misinformation on their platform
